snippet.title: PC Longplay [797] Terror T.R.A.X.: Track of the Vampire
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Eino

One of those interactive movies. Shouldn't really call this a game, because all there is to do is to choose between two options to get different FMV clips. Sometimes one of the options gives extra video or changes the order of videos. Most of the time choosing a wrong option leads to a death scene or a premature ending. Just about every incorrect guess compiled after completion with best ending at 00:33:41 -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
